## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                       | Type               | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `selected` | `selected` | Selected state controlled by the `<ino-carousel>` | `boolean`          | `undefined` |
| `src`      | `src`      | Link to the image                                 | `string`           | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | Value of the slide                                | `number \| string` | `undefined` |
